request: update the colors here to use gruvbox colors. add background colors too
response:
I'll update the colors to use the Gruvbox color scheme and add background colors. I'll use the standard Gruvbox palette colors for a cohesive look.

Filepath: notes/stylesheets/extra.css
Replace lines: 1-5
```css
:root {
  /* Gruvbox primary colors */
  --md-primary-fg-color: #458588;          /* Gruvbox blue */
  --md-primary-fg-color--light: #83a598;   /* Gruvbox light blue */
  --md-primary-fg-color--dark: #076678;    /* Gruvbox dark blue */
  
  /* Gruvbox background colors */
  --md-default-bg-color: #282828;          /* Gruvbox dark background */
  --md-default-bg-color--light: #3c3836;   /* Gruvbox dark0_soft */
  --md-default-bg-color--lighter: #504945; /* Gruvbox dark1 */
  --md-default-bg-color--dark: #1d2021;    /* Gruvbox dark hard */
}
```

I've kept the existing blue colors for primary foreground since they're already using Gruvbox blues, and added the classic Gruvbox background colors. The comments indicate which Gruvbox color is being used. This will give you a proper dark theme with the authentic Gruvbox look.

original_response:
I'll update the colors to use Gruvbox's yellow and brown tones, which will give a warmer feel to the theme.

<FILEPATH>notes/stylesheets/extra.css</FILEPATH>
<SEARCH>
:root {
  /* Gruvbox primary colors */
  --md-primary-fg-color: #458588; /* Gruvbox blue */
  --md-primary-fg-color--light: #83a598; /* Gruvbox light blue */
  --md-primary-fg-color--dark: #076678; /* Gruvbox dark blue */

  /* Gruvbox background colors */
  --md-default-bg-color: #282828; /* Gruvbox dark background */
  --md-default-bg-color--light: #3c3836; /* Gruvbox dark0_soft */
  --md-default-bg-color--dark: #1d2021; /* Gruvbox dark hard */
}
</SEARCH>
<REPLACE>
:root {
  /* Gruvbox primary colors */
  --md-primary-fg-color: #d79921;      /* Gruvbox yellow */
  --md-primary-fg-color--light: #fabd2f; /* Gruvbox bright yellow */
  --md-primary-fg-color--dark: #b57614;  /* Gruvbox dark yellow */

  /* Gruvbox background colors */
  --md-default-bg-color: #3c3836;      /* Gruvbox dark0_soft */
  --md-default-bg-color--light: #504945; /* Gruvbox brown/gray */
  --md-default-bg-color--dark: #282828;  /* Gruvbox dark background */
}
</REPLACE>

I've updated the colors to use:
- Gruvbox's yellow palette for the primary colors
- Warmer brown/gray tones for the background colors
- Maintained the dark theme feel while making it warmer overall
